Uses of Package
net.markenwerk.utils.data.fetcher

  • Classes in net.markenwerk.utils.data.fetcher used by net.markenwerk.utils.data.fetcher 
    Class and Description
    AbstractBufferedByteFetcher
    AbstractBufferedByteFetcher is a sensible base implementation of ByteFetcher that uses a byte[] as buffer, to while copying all bytes from an InputStream to an OutputStream by sequentially reading from the InputStream into the buffer and then writing from the buffer to the OutputStream.
    AbstractBufferedCharacterFetcher
    AbstractBufferedCharacterFetcher is a sensible base implementation of CharacterFetcher that uses a char[] as buffer, to while copying all chars from an Reader to an Writer by sequentially reading from the Reader into the buffer and then writing from the buffer to the Writer.
    AbstractByteFetcher
    AbstractByteFetcher is a sensible base implementation of ByteFetcher.
    AbstractCharacterFetcher
    AbstractCharacterFetcher is a sensible base implementation of CharacterFetcher.
    ByteFetcher
    A ByteFetcher can fetch the entire content of a given InputStream into a fresh byte[] or copy it into a given OutputStream.
    CharacterFetcher
    A CharacterFetcher can fetch the entire content of a given Readable into a fresh char[] or String or copy it into a given Appendable.
    FetchException
    A FetchException is a specialized IOException that indicates that a fetch operation of a ByteFetcher has failed.
    FetchProgressListener
